name: Corporate Pussy
description:
Corporate pussy is a game where you will find never-ending office atmosphere with stacks of papers on the table, the smell of morning coffee and tension in the air between colleagues.

Gameplay
In the game you will play as a new employee who has yet to be joined the exciting office life. Complete different story quests, communicate with your co-workers, building different relationships with them, and also move up the career ladder towards your dream!

Plot
A young guy gets his first job in a large company. He is ambitious, goal-oriented and open-minded. His main dream is to become a big boss and have his own office. But what is he willing to do for this? Almost the entire team at work consists of hot girls with their own interests and unique character. Besides, he must not forget about the boss, with whom it is sometimes not so easy to find a common language.

Feel like a real corporate worker, bringing to life your most secret spicy fantasies!
